name: Unichad
description: What is the project about? UNICHAD is an innovative “meme-utility” token project celebrating the Chads of the UNIBOT community What makes your project unique? 25% of supply was airdropped to diamond-handed UNIBOT holders; the remainder into a liquidity pool. Taxes buy UNIBOT in the open market and UNICHAD holders participate in the revenue generated from these UNIBOT tokens. Community is very engaging. History of your project. UNICHAD was founded by OG UNIBOT users as a fun way to give back to the UNIBOT community What’s next for your project? Finalize revenue sharing details via staking pools, marketing What can your token be used for? To earn revenue generated by UNIBOT tokens held in UNICHAD treasury
